no-restricted-syntax.message: Desktop docked panels must use flexbox (flex-shrink: 0), not absolute positioning. Use position: absolute only inside @media (max-width: 768px).
Closed panels must use display: none, not opacity: 0 or width: 0, to prevent layout artifacts during breakpoint transitions.

no-restricted-properties.message: Resize handlers must NOT close panels. Keep panels open and let CSS handle mode transitions.
